Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot Sx170 is AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: Roderick Clark
Reviews.Content: Camera does EVERYTHING That I Require!!! The Zoom is AMAZING! and since I'm about to graduate Film school I know a lot about Camera functions, and the Hints that the camera gives you are Amazing as well! All the equipment came that it advertised! Happy customer.

Reviews.Title: not as described
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: the camera case DOES not fit the camera inside of it.  It is also a different name brand.  Within one day, some plastic few off the lense.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Carol "CJS"
Reviews.Content: This is my third Canon Powershot and this model has twice the MP of my last.  I am very disappointed in the resolution.  My old 8MP Powershot takes better photos.

Reviews.Title: Very user friendly!
Reviews.Author: Roger B Thigpen
Reviews.Content: This is best little camera I've owned to date, easy to operate, super long battery life, very easy to upload photos to computer etc.cant' be beat for the price.

Reviews.Title: Love it and the seller!
Reviews.Author: hiimtherese
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this little camera and I don't have a single thing bad to say about the camera or the seller. I had a bum SD card in my kit but once I alerted the seller they shipped me a replacement right away! Would definitely buy again and I've recommended it and the seller to everyone!

Reviews.Title: Canon
Reviews.Author: Kao S Saephan
Reviews.Content: I think this camera is great for beginning photographer, I bought it for my son and he really enjoys taking pictures. The camera is light weight and very clear. Would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Would buy again
Reviews.Author: Jagatai
Reviews.Content: Great quality perfect size.  We use it often with a couple of 4 year olds.  Little delay to capture picture helps to get the right shot before the little ones move around.  Thanks!

Reviews.Title: my daughter just loves it!
Reviews.Author: Jeanette S. Herr "JETTY"
Reviews.Content: This made a great Christmas gift!  It takes wonderful photos. very clear, light weight easy to use! came with everything she needed.

Reviews.Title: small camera
Reviews.Author: Don Kipp
Reviews.Content: The camera was smaller than the picture shows but that is fine overall I'm very happy with the item, I will be ordering and have ordered more formal amazon

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD
Reviews.Author: Sadiq Dan-Agboghayemeh
Reviews.Content: The camera is suitable in all the occasions that I have used it so far. Additional memory card would be a plus.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera Package
Reviews.Author: JUST FRANK 52
Reviews.Content: The purchase of this Camera Package was the best choice I have made in a long time. I had been using an old Kodak 530 digital camera with a docking system to down load pictures. Kodak in their wisdom quit supporting their camera and software leaving people like me who update their PCs to a newer version basically lost (a scr word would have defined better) but there was no software updates. The Canon was great, easy to program, easy to set up even for an old guy like me. The mini tripod is interesting don't really know where I might use that but the Canon attached right on to my "adult" size tripod and works extremely well. Two Thumbs Up!! Great Camera, great price, very happy

Reviews.Title: great gifts for small prices
Reviews.Author: cynthia Ross
Reviews.Content: I think this is a great camera at a great deal . Without your website I would have never been able to buy it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera
Reviews.Author: Esperanza
Reviews.Content: The camera is easy to use, has a GREAT zoom. I really recommend this camera. I am happy with my new camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Brosius
Reviews.Content: Got this for the wife and she loves her new camera.  She likes the fact that this camera is faster at taking pictures.

Reviews.Title: Case does not fit
Reviews.Author: mashibe mosena
Reviews.Content: The one problem that I have is that  the case that was sent for the camera is too small so it does not fit, would like to get a case that fits.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: JoAnn Burnham
Reviews.Content: I love what I have seen.I am sure the gift will be a big WOW factor. I am sure the individual receiving it will be greatly surprise.

ProductInfo.Features:
16.0 Megapixel sensor and Canon DIGIC 4 Image Processor deliver enhanced image quality.
Capture impressive 720p HD video in stereo sound with a dedicated movie button and zoom while shooting.
Large 3.0" LCD offers easy viewing even from a wide angle.
Canon's powerful 16x Optical Zoom and 28mm Wide-Angle lens with Optical Image Stabilizer helps reduce camera shake so you achieve brilliant images whether you are up close or far away.
Intelligent IS automatically chooses from six different modes to optimize image stabilization for shake-free images in a wide variety of conditions.
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX170 IS 16MP Digital Camera with 16x Optical Zoom and 3-inch LCD in Black + 8GB SDHC + Compact Camera Case + Mini Tripod + Accessory Kit
